sentences.en: All forms of reciprocal theorems apply to structures which behave linearly.
sentences.cn: 所有形式的互等定理都适用于线性受力状态的结构.

sentences.en: He spoke of the necessity for a reciprocal relationship that would be useful for all sides.
sentences.cn: 他谈及需要建立对各方都有益的互惠关系。

sentences.en: In a traverse, afternoon reciprocal angles should be easy to arrange.
sentences.cn: 在导线测量中, 下午对向观测垂直角应该是容易安排的.

sentences.en: It is well known that there are reciprocal actions in the simplest reflexes.
sentences.cn: 大家知道,即使在最简单的反射中也有交互作用.

sentences.en: Opacity is the reciprocal of transmission.
sentences.cn: 阻光率是透射率的倒数.

sentences.en: Our relationship is based on reciprocal respect.
sentences.cn: 我们的关系是以互相尊重为基础的.

sentences.en: Such treaties provide reciprocal rights and obligations.
sentences.cn: 此类协议规定了相互之间的权利与义务。

sentences.en: The degree of recombination is reciprocal in most cases.
sentences.cn: 重新结合的程度在大多数情况下是相互的.

sentences.en: The matrix is defined as the reciprocal of A.
sentences.cn: 该矩阵定义为A之逆矩阵.

sentences.en: The probability of survival is the reciprocal of fecundity.
sentences.cn: 生存的概率是生殖力的倒数.

sentences.en: The reciprocal of viscosity is known as fluidity.
sentences.cn: 粘度的反意就是流动性.

sentences.en: The vocation advocate found the word "vocal" and "reciprocal" not in the vocabulary.
sentences.cn: 职业倡导者发现“嗓音的”和“交互的”两词不在词汇表中。

sentences.en: They expected a reciprocal gesture before more hostages could be freed.
sentences.cn: 在更多人质获得自由之前他们期望看到对方也有相应的表示。

sentences.en: They have a reciprocal loathing for each other.
They were on a footing of reciprocal tolerance.
sentences.cn: 他们总是格格不入,面和心不和.

sentences.en: This means that a general element of the flexibility matrix is known as Maxwell's reciprocal relation.
sentences.cn: 这意味着,对于柔度矩阵的一般元素是为众所周知的马克斯威尔互等关系.

words.tran_cn: [贸易]互惠的；相互的；[数]倒数的，彼此相反的

phrases.tran_cn: 互相酌；相互酌；交互作用
相互转化；反向变换；倒数转换

trans.tran_en: involving two people or groups who agree to help each other or behave in the same way to each other

trans.tran_cn: [数] 倒数；互相起作用的事物
